member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DECORATION
member.summary: Specifies how text is decorated (underlined and so on).

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DECORATION.MF_TIMED_TEXT_DECORATION_LINE_THROUGH
member.summary: Text has a line through it.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DECORATION.MF_TIMED_TEXT_DECORATION_OVERLINE
member.summary: Text has a line over it.
